SELECT ri.*, di.`name` AS drugName, pi.`name` AS pharmacyName, ui.`name` AS userName FROM report_info ri LEFT JOIN drug_info di ON ( di.id = ri.drug_id ) LEFT JOIN pharmacy_info pi ON ( pi.id = ri.pharmacy_id ) LEFT JOIN user_info ui ON ( ui.id = ri.user_id ) WHERE 1 = 1
AND ri.code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{reportInfo.code},'%')
ORDER BY ri.create_date DESC
